name: Ghost Wheel? Bundle
description:
a while ago, DEVCHAT held a gamejam.

the theme was ‘ghost wheel?’. nine games were the result:

Spooky Ghost Wheel Town, by @rubna_

Everyday Ghosts, by @IMPLODINGORACLE and @DannyG1888

A Walk In The Rain by @tomkail

AGPPBP by @takorii and mc hepher

play the updated version here at tak.itch.io

ghost by @hugs_and_fire and @nxTOS

Prowl, by @poxican and @DannyG1888

Carnighoul, by @KeyMaster_

Music for Decay, by @folmerkelly and @isyourguy

Invasion, by @Fatalsleep, @Hangongetready, and @retrostark
